sentences.en: He had frequent attacks of malaria.
I've just recovered from a bout of malaria.
In some parts of the world malaria is still pandemic.
sentences.cn: 在世界上一些地区疟疾仍然具有高传染性。

sentences.en: Last year the hospital treated over forty cases of malaria.
sentences.cn: 去年这所医院医治了四十馀例疟疾病人.

sentences.en: Malaria is a kind of serious malady.
sentences.cn: 疟疾是一种严重的疾病.

sentences.en: Malaria is bursting out again all over the world.
sentences.cn: 疟疾突然又在全世界流行起来。

sentences.en: Malaria is still rampant in some swampy regions.
sentences.cn: 疟疾在一些沼泽地区仍很猖獗.
蚊子是疟疾的传播媒介。

sentences.en: Mosquitoes are feared as vectors of malaria.
sentences.cn: 恐怕蚊子是疟疾的传播体。

sentences.en: Next week, health ministers gather in Amsterdam to agree a strategy for controlling malaria.
sentences.cn: 下周，卫生部长们将在阿姆斯特丹聚首共商防治疟疾的策略。

sentences.en: Quinine is an effectual preventive for malaria.
sentences.cn: 奎宁是有效的疟疾预防药.

sentences.en: Roll on the day someone develops an effective vaccine against malaria.
sentences.cn: 盼望有一天有人会研制出一种能有效预防疟疾的疫苗。

sentences.en: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not.
sentences.cn: 而根除疟疾运动则未做到这一点。

sentences.en: There's still a high incidence of malaria in the area.
sentences.cn: 这一地区疟疾的患病率仍然很高.

sentences.en: They are already battling to eradicate illnesses such as malaria and tetanus.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在努力消灭疟疾、破伤风等疾病。

sentences.en: To reach our goal of near zero deaths from malaria by 2015, we need an extraordinary intensification of our actions in two key areas.
sentences.cn: 我们要想在2015年以前达到疟疾死亡人数近于零的目标，必须格外加强我们在两个关键领域的行动。

sentences.en: We know how to prevent malaria.
sentences.cn: 我们知道怎样去阻止疟疾。

trans.tran_en: a disease that is common in hot countries and that you get when a type of  mosquito  bites you
